resources.string: Save your memories with Tour Diary
Are you sure that you want to delete this item?

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Tour Diary is an Android Application, intended for use primarily by tourist on holiday in Bulgaria. The client has access to database containing the main national landmarks in the country. He can keep records of all the beautiful places he had been. Additionally the application keeps track of the user current location, so he can see himself on the map.
This app is created for a Telerik Academy Teamwork by Miroslav Gatsanoga and Dobromir Brezoev
